Package index

All functions

collapse_cats()
Collapses factor levels and returns a new data frame
create_project()
This package will create a function called create_project()
scale_colour_stem() scale_color_stem() scale_fill_stem()
Sequential, diverging and qualitative color scales from stemtools
se_mean()
Computes parametric standard error for mean
se_median()
Computes parametric standard error for median
se_prop()
Computes parametric standard error for proportions
stem_ggsave()
Export Stem plots
stem_palettes()
Select a Color Palette
stem_plot()
General plotting function
stem_plot_bar()
Plot a simple barchart
stem_plot_barstack()
Plot a stacked barchart
stem_plot_battery()
Plot battery of like items
stem_plot_multiselect()
Plot a set of multiselection choice items
stem_summarise()
Summarise numeric or categorical variable (possibly segmented)
stem_summarise_cat()
Summarise categorical variable (possibly segmented)
stem_summarise_num()
Summarise numeric variable using arithmetic mean (possibly segmented)
theme_stem()
Basic ggplot2 theme for Stem.
trust
Simulated data on attitudes towards institutions

Developed by Aleš Vomáčka.
